name: City Bike Racer
description:
Welcome to City Bike Racer Game!

It's amazing real bike race game for love bike racer. There are different bike with different speed. Reach your goal and unlock new bike. Select magnet and nitro booster for more bike power.

There are two different theme word and 4 type of camera angel to view your game. Create your most distance score and challenge your friends.

Features:
========
- Nitro booster and magnet power.
- 4 Different bike with different speed.
- Two word of theme.
- 4 type of camera angel view.
- Beautiful graphic design.

So are you ready for play. Download Now...

Don't forget review us!
